param.name: pert_attrs
param.label: Attractors generated from Perturbations on the FVS Control nodes

data.label: internal-marker nodes in attracotrs from perturbations that passed filtering criterion 1

tool.help: This tool extracts the steady-state values of internal-marker nodes in the attractors from perturbations whose attractors passed filtering criterion 1. Required Inputs: 1. Perturbation Attractors 2. Perturbation Attractors IDs that shifted to a different state/cluster 3. Internal Control Nodes
